title: Public two-year

Living expenses covered by grant aid

metadata.notes: Net tuition and fee amounts are calculated by subtracting average total grant aid for all full-time students, including those who do and do not receive grant aid, from the published tuition and fee price. This yields a slightly different measure than that identified in NPSAS as net tuition and fees, because that calculation excludes any aid individual students receive that exceeds their tuition and fee prices.
